alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 21 at 11:53PM PDT until October 22 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 PM PDT SATURDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph, mainly on higher peaks and ridges. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very challenging at times, especially Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While accumulations at the major passes are not expected to be much, this is the first major front of the autumn season, and roads could be slick at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
